product_name: Appalachian Mountain Club White Mountains Trail Map - Crawford Notch - Sandwich Range and Moosilauke - Kinsman
long_description: This Appalachian Mountain Club trail map lets you explore the White Mountain National Forest armed with the latest information packed into a waterproof package. Map comes in a handy folded size for portability. Larger scale maps include mileage data for trail segments; printed on light, waterproof and tear-resistant paper to withstand backcountry treks. Covers the Crawford Notch and Sandwich Range, including Presidential Range-Dry River Wilderness and Pemigewasset Wilderness. On the reverse are detailed maps of the Moosilauke and Kinsman areas, including Waterville Valley and Franconia Notch State Park. Scale of 1:79,200; measures 27 by 22 in. and folds to 9.75 by 3.75 in. Appalachian Mountain Club; copyright 2012.
short_description: This Appalachian Mountain Club trail map lets you explore the White Mountain National Forest armed with the latest information packed into a waterproof package.
